column1: @BrianStewartOH Please let me know what you think.  I respect Hayes a lot.

@BrianStewartOH Looks great!

Today’s 8.4% Unemployment numbers in Context. Unemployment was HIGHER for most of 2009 and all of 2010 and 2011. Credit to Dave Winston for the analysis. Please Remember that Unemployment was at a 50 year low in Feb… https://t.co/bxH5iqCBcJ

The #ThinBlueLine works day-in and day-out to keep our neighborhoods safe. It was great to spend time with some of Franklin County’s finest today and thank them for their hard work. https://t.co/DS9LDEZZbh
@BrianStewartOH Nice!
@BrianStewartOH Yep.  My family built that Road.
@BrianStewartOH You may not know that I grew up in Brown County.  U.S. Grant graduated from my high school in Ripley. I hope you enjoyed it. Grant was a great general and an under rated President.

243 years ago the Continental Congress founded a nation that values life liberty and the pursuit of happiness. Our nation today faces many challenges but those values are our guiding light and will ensure we remain a symbol of hope and the envy of the world for 243 more years. https://t.co/2OEY8eC8Yg

The most important job title I have is “Dad” and raising my two kids and instilling the same values in them that my dad instilled in me. Happy Father’s Day to all of the dads out there. https://t.co/TtihRdsFhH
Thank you to the Republican voters of Iowa’s 4th district for nominating a great man for Congress Randy Feenstra defeating  Congressman Steve King. https://t.co/uhEbKuiNG9
Virtual 5k in honor of the fallen. Not my fastest time but it’s semi respectable. Enjoy your Memorial Day. #memorialday #neverforget https://t.co/jfR6ESzcOS

Today I am thrilled to join @realdonaldtrump in endorsing @RonnyJackson4TX for #TX13. Ronny Jackson is a retired Navy Rear Admiral who will accomplish great things for our veterans in Congress. Please join me in supporting Ronny Jackson for Congress! https://t.co/GfmKFwSdkG
@DanteAtkins Said the man in a hateful tone.

Rep. Steve King claims he will get his committees back next year.  As long as I am a member of the Republican Steering Committee I will not allow hate & bigotry to influence the legislation passed by Congress.  He will not be serving on any committee.  https://t.co/OLjkKrSS4L

Someone forwarded me an article where Rep. Steve King claims he will get his committees back next year. I am a member of the Republican Steering Committee and former NRCC Chairman and as long as I am a member of… https://t.co/5HNxtt5vPu

Today we recognize some very important women in our lives.   Now more than ever I’m grateful for my amazing wife Karen for everything she does for our family.  I’m also thankful for my mom Carol who instilled in me the values that made me who I am today. Happy Mother’s Day! https://t.co/B2wgfWXBxh
Thanks to the voters of #OH15. I'm grateful for your support and I'll keep working hard to make you proud.
As #coronavirus brings stress and uncertainty it's nice to have something to cheer for. Congratulations to #OH15 native @Joe_Burrow10. Welcome back to #Ohio! #WhoDey

Today on #HolocaustRemembranceDay we remember the millions of victims of the Holocaust.  We cannot allow future generations to forget their stories.  Thank you Mr. Fenichel for sharing your powerful message. https://t.co/xY1IJgKE2F
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools. Reflecting on the powerful message of unity from Dr. King today. https://t.co/owXJgxVMlL
